name: 5 Nights At 173's
description:
5 Night's At 173's is a FNAF-SCP crossover where the gameplay style and mechanics of FNAF are mixed with characters from the SCP Foundation. Play through nights 1-5 with the many mechanics, or try out the Extreme or Random nights for an extra challenge.

(GAME BY PAUL DEANGELIS)

(ALL RIGHTS TO 5 NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S BELONGS TO SCOTT CAWTHON)

(CHARACTER MODELS FROM SCP: CONTAINMENT BREACH)

(UI SOUNDS FROM 5 NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S)

(ASSETS USED: TEXTMESH PRO, UNITY POSTPROCESSING)
